sentences.en: Beneath the present church were remnants of Roman flooring.
sentences.cn: 在目前的这座教堂下面还有残余的古罗马地板。

sentences.en: He is suffering from some remnant feeling of disgrace.
sentences.cn: 他还在为残留的耻辱感到苦恼.

sentences.en: He ripped the remnant of one of his blankets into strips and bound his bleeding feet.
sentences.cn: 他把撕剩的那条毯子扯成一条条的,裹好那双鲜血淋淋的脚.

sentences.en: I will sell this remnant to you, at cost.
sentences.cn: 我愿将此剩货照成本卖给你.

sentences.en: It matters little where we pass the remnant of our days.
sentences.cn: 我们在什么地方度过我们的余年已经无关紧要.

sentences.en: It'seemed to her now that she could marry him without the remnant of a scruple.
sentences.cn: 她觉得现在她可以跟他成婚而不需要有任何顾忌.

sentences.en: Painterly theory follows with respect to remnant canvas if wanting to learn.
sentences.cn: 要学的话就剩油画跟绘画理论了.

sentences.en: She bought a remnant of silk at a bargain.
sentences.cn: 她廉价购得一块零头丝布.

sentences.en: She had rid herself of every remnant of that tonic wildness.
sentences.cn: 在她身上,那种健康的野性已荡然无存.

sentences.en: The Ainu settlers in Hokkaido are the last remnant of a prehistoric race.
sentences.cn: 北海道的阿伊努人是史前某个种族的最后残存者.

sentences.en: The remnant n ( t ) is the difference between the actual pilot output and the linear approximation to it.
sentences.cn: 剩余值n ( t ) 是驾驶员的真实输出和它的线性近似之差.

sentences.en: The remnant nebular gas pervades the interplanetary space.
sentences.cn: 星云的残余气体充斥星际空间.

sentences.en: The remnant of his army went into the interior.
The superior clergy and a small remnant of other educated men read and wrote Latin.
sentences.cn: 上等的神职人员和一小部分残余的其他受过教育的人使用拉丁语读写.

sentences.en: There's the remnant of satin she stole.
sentences.cn: 这就是她偷去的那块零头缎子.

sentences.en: We saw, a youth has not consciousness remnant dream.
sentences.cn: 我们看到了, 一点青春未苏醒的残梦.

phrases.tran_cn: 超新星遗迹，超新星残骸

trans.tran_cn: 剩余部分，残余，幸存者，零料，零头布
trans.tran_en: a small part of something that remains after the rest of it has been used, destroyed, or eaten
